news.en: Paper Survey on Cooperative Perception in an Automotive Context has been published in IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems.

Paper Multi-Agent Cooperative Camera-Based Evidential Occupancy Grid Generation has been presented and published in IEEE 25th International Conference on Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITSC) in Macao.
Defended my thesis Onboard/offboard extended perception for autonomous navigation at ESIGELEC, Rouen.
Started the JSPS post-doctoral fellowship at CNRS-AIST JRL.
Poster presentation at the 27e Journée Francophone de la Recherche held at the Maison Franco-Japonaise, Tokyo, Japan.
Paper Multi-Agent Cooperative Camera-Based Semantic Grid Generation has been published in Journal of Intelligent & Robotic Systems.
Attendance to IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA) in Yokohama, Japan.
Attendance to Reconnaissance des Formes, Image, Apprentissage et Perception (RFIAP) Conference in Lille, France.
Attendance to Capteurs visuels émergents et applications Journée inter GdR IASIS et Robotique GdR IASIS Conference in Paris, France.
Presentation of my work on emergent vision sensors at ESIGELEC in Rouen, France.
Begining of the supervision of GUILLAUME Constantin, intern at the CNRS-AIST JRL.
Starting a new postdoctal fellowship with the CNRS at the CNRS-AIST JRL.
